text: ralph myers took the stand before this
court swore to tell the truth
and proceeded to recant most if not all
of the relevant portions of his
testimony at trial
clearly he has either perjured himself
at trial or in front of this court
after careful review
it is this court's opinion that
conclusive evidence has not been
provided that ralph myers purged himself
at the original trial
and that pressure put on him since his
trial testimony could tend to discredit
his recantation
therefore it is ordered a judged and
decreed that the trial testimony of
ralph myers is not found to have been
perjured testimony
and no new trial shall be granted at
this time
walter mcmillan shall be returned to
holman correctional facility where he is
to face death by electrocution
